meanings.definition: The quality or state of being ridiculous or absurd.
meanings.sent1: The ludicrousnesses of the situation made everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent2: The movie's ludicrousnesses had the audience in stitches.
meanings.sent3: The teacher couldn't help but chuckle at the ludicrousnesses of the student's excuse.
meanings.sent4: The ludicrousnesses of the politician's promises were as clear as day.
meanings.sent5: The ludicrousnesses of the clown's act will be remembered for years to come.

meanings.definition: Something that is laughably absurd or ridiculous.
meanings.sent1: The comedy show was filled with hilarious ludicrousnesses.
meanings.sent2: The book is full of entertaining ludicrousnesses that will make you smile.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled at the ludicrousnesses of the cartoon characters.
meanings.sent4: The absurdity of the situation reached new heights of ludicrousnesses.
meanings.sent5: The movie's ludicrousnesses were so over-the-top that it became a cult classic.
